targets = train_transaction.isFraud
ax = sns.countplot(targets, label="Count", palette="Set3")
Y,N = targets.value_counts()
print('Is Fraud:',Y,"Percent:",int(Y/(Y+N)*100),"%")
print('Is not fraud:',N,"   Percent:",int(N/(Y+N)*100),"%")
